mapper.select: select work_order_num, work_order_type, work_order_name, worker_num, work_order_state, expiration_time, name from adminSearchOrder_table limit #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into adminSearchOrder_table(work_order_num, work_order_type, work_order_name, worker_num, work_order_state, expiration_time, name) values (#{workOrderNum}, #{workOrderType}, #{workOrderName}, #{workerNum}, #{workOrderState}, #{expirationTime}, #{name})

insert into adminSearchOrder_table(work_order_num, work_order_type, work_order_name, worker_num, work_order_state, expiration_time, name) values
(#{entity.workOrderNum}, #{entity.workOrderType}, #{entity.workOrderName}, #{entity.workerNum}, #{entity.workOrderState}, #{entity.expirationTime}, #{entity.name})
